item.title: The EV tax credit expires today — and time’s running out to save money on these other green upgrades. Here’s what to do.
item.description: Time is not on the side of anyone seeking help from Uncle Sam with their electric-vehicle purchase or their home’s clean-energy upgrades.

item.title: Here’s one clear sign investors aren’t worrying about an AI bubble right now
item.description: Has speculation finally peaked about whether there is an artificial-intelligence bubble? According to data from Google Trends, it is beginning to look...

item.title: A government shutdown would hurt home-buying deals just as buyers are coming off the sidelines
item.description: Aspiring homeowners applying for government-backed mortgages or flood insurance may face sudden delays if the government shuts down

item.title: Housing market shows sudden strength as buyers take advantage of falling mortgage rates
item.description: Pending home sales rose to a five-month high in August as lower mortgage rates reeled home buyers back into the housing market.

item.title: Amazon was late to the AI party. Here’s how the stock can make a comeback.
item.description: An industry shift from AI training to inference is about to become a major tailwind for Amazon Web Services
